description: Creates or removes managed zones in Google Cloud DNS.

description.description: An arbitrary text string to use for the zone description.

zone.description: The DNS domain name of the zone.

service_account_email.description: The e-mail address for a service account with access to Google Cloud DNS.

pem_file.description: The path to the PEM file associated with the service account email.

state.description: Whether the given zone should or should not be present.

credentials_file.description: The path to the JSON file associated with the service account email.

project_id.description: The Google Cloud Platform project ID to use.
